body_html: Thank for the PR! I added test_util.IsMklEnabled() in tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py that returns true if TensorFlow has been build with MKL support. Please use it instead of TF_MKL_TEST environment variable to guard tests that should be performed only when using MKL.
body_text: Thank for the PR! I added test_util.IsMklEnabled() in tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py that returns true if TensorFlow has been build with MKL support. Please use it instead of TF_MKL_TEST environment variable to guard tests that should be performed only when using MKL.
body: Thank for the PR! I added test_util.IsMklEnabled() in tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py that returns true if TensorFlow has been build with MKL support. Please use it instead of TF_MKL_TEST environment variable to guard tests that should be performed only when using MKL.
